name: Fish
description: Fish stocks have been seriously depleted by overfishing.

name: Wetlands
description: 50% of wetlands in the watershed have been filled or drained.

name: Enforcement
description: Enforcement of wetlands, fishing, and pollutions laws is greatly limited. A tripling will greatly increase enforcement but will still be below full level.

name: Income
description: The average per capita income in 2010 is reported to be $5,000.

name: Pollution
description: The lake is heavily polluted with agricultural runoff and untreated urban sewage.
